text:
Great value but comes at a price. Tiny room, No sofa bed as described, mattress on the floor; we had to ask them to change, bathroom tiny as well with shower not separate, no option to control Aircon; we got sick; then they turned it off where it got crazy hot….
Many more hotels around with a lot better quality for similar prices! Just location was good

Room is clean, not too big, full amenities (soap/shampoo, toothbrush, toothpaste), have hairdryer as well. There’s a tap water in the bathroom. Staff okay. Very strategic hotel, near MRT and bus stop. A lot of depot nearby.
The superior queen room is small, and the bathroom is small, too. But it is enough for two. The staff are helpful. The room has a window, but when you open the curtain you cannot see any views
Centralized air-conditioning. You will suffer for the whole night. And the hygiene was bad. Many hair falls on the floor, so I was in doubt either they changed the bed sheet.

Quite a basic and budget option! Room was small with no window but the bed was surprisingly comfortable and the A/C worked well (despite having no control). The location is quite good as well being quite close to MRT Nicoll Highway station.
